name: cubimals
description:
Important: Please play the game in full screen mode! 📺 🐶 cubimals cubimals was developed during GMTK Game Jam 2022 within 48 hours.  🐈 Gameplay

You're playing cubimals with a cranky Dungeon Master!

This is a fast paced bullet hell featuring cute cube animals and cranky dungeon master.  Your goal is to beat the DM's one shot campaign, consisting of 3 maps.  The DM will spawn enemies for you to fight.  You will also collect dice during and after completing a map.  You can roll your dice anytime to give your player powerups.  WATCH OUT!  If you roll to many power up dice you will anger the DM making the enemies much more powerful.  Good luck and enjoy CUBIMALS.

🎮 Controls

Keyboard
WASD - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Shoot
Space - Dash

🎉 Credits

🎁 Upcoming Features 

Features we wish to add after the Game Jam is done

DM Dice: When the DM Rage hits 100% , the DM will roll his collected dice.  Which could drastically affect the game.  For example, spawning more enemies or bosses, traps, changing the board layout.
